name: Firefox: move Paste and Go(Search) to Top
description:
Make Firefox browser move “Paste and Go” to the top of context menu in urlbar only when ENABLED(not grayscaled). Please paste the code to the userChrome.css file and restart Firefox to take effect. Fx68+ tested. (Access your userChrome.css file by click ≡ ➔ help ➔ TroubleShooting ➔ open your profile folder ➔ click folder "Chrome") About the workaround you could find here

Styling Firefox UI

on Github for more information.
